inventory
Class Ratings

java.lang.Object
  inventory.Ratings

public class Ratings
extends java.lang.Object

This is a singleton class responsible for keeping track of an up to date list of possible Ratings, using the singleton design pattern. Get an instance by calling getInstance() Then you can find out what Ratings are in the database by calling getRatings() If you change the Ratings taht are in the database then call update() Reference: http://www.oodesign.com/singleton-pattern.html Reference: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2284502/singleton-and-exception

Method Summary
static Ratings getInstance()
          Returns an instance of Ratings ensuring that only one instance is ever created.
 java.lang.String[] getRatings()
          Returns the possible Ratings that a video can have
 void update()
          Updates the possible Ratings.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

getInstance

public static Ratings getInstance()
Returns an instance of Ratings ensuring that only one instance is ever created.

Returns:
the instance of Ratings

getRatings

public java.lang.String[] getRatings()
Returns the possible Ratings that a video can have

Returns:
an array of Ratings, held as strings

update

public void update()
            throws java.sql.SQLException,
                   java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Updates the possible Ratings. Should be called when new Ratings are added to the database or old Ratings are removed.

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
